main
Class SystemVariables

java.lang.Object
  main.SystemVariables

public class SystemVariables
extends java.lang.Object

This singleton class provides a simple read/write interface to a plain text file. An OS independent registry.

Author:
Michael Wood, Helen Bretzke

          Force all nodes to the largest used radius
